2500.name: The Entrance To The Shadow Grove
2500.description:
before, the grove of shadows lies. Giant grey trees are all that can
be seen through the thick shadows. A great sense of both power and
menace permeates the surrounding area. You have a strange urge to turn
back and go back the way you've come. A small path leads north into the
shadows and back south to the plains. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

south.description: The copse of trees and plains are back to the south.

2501.name: The Shadow Grove
2501.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
shadows, you are very confused. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2502.name: The Shadow Grove
2502.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
shadows, you are very confused. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: You see a small clearing in the shadows.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2503.name: The Shadow Grove
2503.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem the glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into

scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2504.name: The Shadow Grove
2504.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
shadows, you are very confused. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2505.name: The Shadow Grove
2505.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2506.name: The Shadow Grove
2506.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
shadows, you are very confused. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

west.description: You see a small clearing in the shadows.

2507.name: The Shadow Grove
2507.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
shadows, you are very confused. Ancient trees rise on all sides.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2508.description:

sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All exits lead into
