north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2509.name: The Shadow Grove
2509.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All directions lead into
shadows, you are very confused. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering
the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2510.name: The Shadow Grove
2510.description:
This isside the shadow grove. Giant trees seem to glare at you from all
sides. The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision. Strange sounds of
moaning and growling come from all directions. All directions lead into
shadows, you are very confused. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird
calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows part to reveal a small clearing.

2511.name: A Small Clearing
2511.description:
This is a small clearing in the shadow grove. There is charred grass
underfoot, and the signs of fire here and there. It is almost as if the
plant life shuns this spot. The shadowy mist hovers all around,
obscuring your view into the grove. A small path leads north to some
shadowy structure. All other exits are shrouded in shadowy mist.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on
all sides.

north.description: You can barely make out some sort of building to the north.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2512.name: The Entrance To The High Tower
2512.description:
You have reached the entrance to the High Tower of Sorcery. The tower
looms above at an incredible height. It seems to disappear into the
storm clouds above. A diamond gate is to the north, whilst the trail
back south has disappeared behind. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: The diamond gate looks incredibly strong.

2513.name: Inside The High Tower Of Sorcery
2513.description:
This isside the High Tower of Sorcery. The sight is truly amazing. From
here, it is obvious that somehow, the tower is much larger on the inside
than it is on the outside. Young mages walk about, completely oblivious
to your presence. Exits lead north to the common room, west to the
dinning room, east to a plain hallway and back south through the gate.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

north.description: The common room looks quite busy and noisy.

2514.name: Common Room
2514.description:
This is the common room. There are many apprentice warlocks here talking
and resting, playing games, comparing notes. Obviously they are taking a
break from their rigorous studies. There are benches, tables and a small
water fountain here, otherwise the room is quite unremarkable. Exits
lead off in all directions. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The mages' bar can be seen to the east.

2515.name: The Hallway
2515.description:
This is a long hallway, it seems rather unremarkable. The hallway
continues east and back west. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

2516.name: The Dining Room
2516.description:
This is the dining area of the student mages. From the number of tables
and chairs here, Visible is that this room could easily seat several
hundred people. It is oddly deserted here, obviously not meal time.
Exits lead west to the kitchen, and back east. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2517.name: A Dark Hallway
2517.description:
This is a dark hallway. It is apparent that this area is seldom used by
the regular occupants of the tower. Dust covers the floors here. The
faint outline of a trapdoor can be seen in the dust. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2518.name: The Mages' Tavern
2518.description:
This is the mages' tavern. The air is smokey and filled with the smells
of foreign food and drink. The other patrons pay you little heed, as
they obviously have more interesting things to contemplate. The only
exit leads back west. The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2519.name: The Magic Shop
2519.description:
This is the High Tower's store of magic. This place sells all sorts of
herbs, parchment and other reagents used in magical studies. The only
exit leads back east to the common room. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
Shadows gather in the corners.

2520.name: The Kitchen
2520.description:
This is a small kitchen. All the usual kitchen type utensils and
equipment is here, including some not so usual ones. Among the later, a
huge black oven against one wall, it must be at least 12 feet high.
Opposite the oven is an equally enormous meat locker, large enough to
comfortably store several hapless adventurers no doubt. In the middle of
the room, hanging in mid-air is a spice rack. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2521.name: Below The Trapdoor
2521.description:
The area is below the trapdoor. It is very dark and dusty here, very
little light filters through from above. A faint sound of dripping water
can be heard in the distance below. A rope ladder leads down. Shadows
gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2522.name: A Damp Intersection
2522.description:
This is a damp intersection of what seems to be the basement of the
tower. The sound of running water can be heard coming from the south,
other than that, an almost tangible stillness fills the air. Passages
lead off in all directions, and a ladder leads up. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: A faint light can be seen in the distance up the east passage.

2523.name: A Dark Passage
2523.description:
This is the end of a dark passage which ends in a stout wooden door.
Other then through the door, the only apparent exit is back the way you
came. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch.

2524.name: A Dark Passage
2524.description:
This is the end of a dark passage. A half opened door is to the east,
shedding soft light around the edges. Faint snoring sounds can be heard
behind the door. Exits lead east through the door, or back west. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

2525.name: The Stagnant Pool
2525.description:
This is the edge of a stagnant pool of water. The smell here is quite
nauseating. This is apparently where the denizens of the tower dispose
of their garbage. Faint gurgling can be heard from beneath the surface
of the pool. Exits lead back north, or perhaps for the very adventurous,
down into the pool. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

down.description: No light penetrates the gloom of the stagnant pool.

2526.name: A Dark Passage
2526.description:
This is a dark passage, which comes to an abrupt stop at what appears to
be a cave-in to the west. It is certainly unpassable, and perhaps quite
dangerous just being this close. The only exit leads back east. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

2527.name: A Dark Cell
2527.description:
This is a dark cell. Straw and dirt cover the floors here, it is very
dark. Someone, or something seems to be chained to the far wall. The
only exit is back south. The air is still and musty. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2528.name: The Jailor's office
2528.description:
This is the Jailor's office. It is rather messy here. Judging by the
sleeping form of the Jailor on duty, you can surmise that very few, if
any prisoners survive long enough to spend much time in these dank
dungeons. The only exit leads back west. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2529.name: Below The Stagnant Pool
2529.description:
As you dive beneath the putrid waters, you feel a strong tug and a
whirlpool drags you under. The area is sucked into blackness. You feel
your lungs burst from lack of oxygen. Just as you feel your life fading,
you notice a change in direction... and are sucked under by a rip tide.
The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

2530.name: The Hallway
2530.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2531.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2531.description:
This is a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which
provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in the corners. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

2532.name: A Store Room
2532.description:
This is a small store room. Assorted junk is piled on shelves or leaning
against walls. The only apparent exit it back south. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2533.name: A Broom Closet
2533.description:
This is a dark broom closet. Many straw brooms and other cleaning
instruments have been left here, apparently unused (perhaps the maid
quit?). The only exit leads back north to the hallway. Dust motes drift
in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

2534.name: A Hallway
2534.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The air is still and
musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2535.name: The Guardians' chamber
2535.description:
This is the chamber of the tower guardians. It is rather sparsely
furnished, but then again the odd occupants don't look to need
furniture. Here and there a disembodied pair of hands or eyes flits
about. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch.

2536.name: A Guest Bedroom
2536.description:
This is a small guest bedroom. A small cot is in one corner, and a dusty
mirror on one wall, other than that the room looks quite bare, and
unused. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway. The
ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

2537.name: A Guest Bedroom
2537.description:
This is a comfortable looking bedroom. A small globe of magical energy
floats overhead, providing light. A small cot is in one corner looking
ever so comfortable, so comfortable in fact... someone is sleeping in
it. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2538.name: A hallway
2538.description:
This is a long hallway leading from the south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Stairs lead up to
the next level and the hallway leads back south. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2539.name: The Burnt Room
2539.description:
This is what looks to have once been a guest bed room. The walls are
blackened and burnt by what you could only imagine to be magical fire.
There is no sign of the previous occupant, undoubtedly he left in a
hurry. The only exit leads back west to the hallway. The air is still
and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

2540.name: A Hallway
2540.description:
This is a long hallway leading west from here. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Some faint moonlight
can be seen in the cul de sac to the east. The hallway continues west
and stairs lead down to the level below. The air is still and musty.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: Faint moonlight can be seen to the east.

2541.name: A Cul De Sac
2541.description:
This is a small cul de sac. A window to the east is letting in moonlight
and a pleasant breeze. Through it, the surrounding country side can be
seen. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway. Shadows
gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2542.name: The Apprentices' Barracks
2542.description:
This is the barracks of the apprentice magic users. Here and there, a
young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble
cantrip. Cots line the walls, and the room continues west. The air is
still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

2543.name: A Hallway
2543.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a door to
the north, and the hallway continues west or back east. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2544.name: The Apprentices' Barracks
2544.description:
This is the barracks of the apprentice magic users. Here and there, a
young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble
cantrip. Cots line the walls, and the room continues east. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2545.name: A Hallway
2545.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Flashes of light can
be seen under the doorway to the north. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A flash of blue light momentarily lights up the door's outline.

2546.name: The Apprentices' Workshop
2546.description:
This is a small workshop. Writing implements and parchment are strewn
about on a few worktables. In the far corner several young mages have a
small kitten cornered and seem to be testing spells upon it. The only
apparent exit leads back south to the hallway. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

2547.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2547.description:
This is a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which
provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues south and back
east. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

2548.name: The Hallway
2548.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a closed
metal door to the west. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs
low overhead.

2549.name: A Classroom
2549.description:
This is a large classroom filled with bored looking students of the art.
The instructor stops in his lecture on the fine uses of magic missile at
your entry and lunges to attack you. The only apparent exit is back east
to the hallway. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air
is still and musty.

2550.name: A Hallway
2550.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The air is still and
musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2551.name: A Hallway
2551.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2552.name: An Empty Classroom
2552.description:
This is an empty classroom. Some strange sigils are written on a
blackboard which is floating in the air here. Other than a few desks, it
is bare of furnishings. The only apparent exit leads back east to the
hallway. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2553.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2553.description:
This is a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which
provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues east and north.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2554.name: An Empty Classroom
2554.description:
This is an apparently empty classroom. A strange feeling of being
watched comes over you, and you hear the faint rustle of robes. The only
apparent exit is back east to the hallway. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

2555.name: A Hallway
2555.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A sturdy iron door
can be seen to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2556.name: A Hallway
2556.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. There is a large
oaken door to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still
and musty.

2557.name: The Amphitheater
2557.description:
This is a small amphitheater. Rows of comfortable looking chairs circle
a large podium. The echos of your footsteps seem very loud here. The
only apparent exit leads north to the hallway. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2558.name: A Hallway
2558.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow providing enough light to see by. A small door can be seen
to the south. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

2559.name: The Training Room
2559.description:
This is a large training room. It is filled with battle scared manikins,
and many other devices used in the practice of fighting. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2560.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2560.description:
This is a bend in the hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow which
provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and west.
The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

2561.name: A Dueling Room
2561.description:
This is a large room used for duals arcane. The walls, ceiling and floor
all bare the scars of many fiery spells, but still look quite strong and
hold fast. The only exit leads north to the hallway. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2562.name: A Hallway
2562.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A doorway can be
seen to the east. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and
musty.

2563.name: A Hallway
2563.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A wooden door can
been seen to the east. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2564.name: The Spellmasters' Lounge
2564.description:
This is a large comfortable looking lounge. Off duty spell teachers are
here relaxing in their idle time. A large coffee machine is against the
far wall. The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway. Shadows
gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2565.name: A Bedroom
2565.description:
This is a large, plush bedroom. The owner is obviously someone of high
standing in the magical community here. An ice mirror is on one wall,
and a scrying globe sit on a stand in the middle of the room. An
enormous bed can be seen floating about a meter above the floor. The
only exit leads back west to the hallway. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. Shadows gather in the corners.

2566.name: A Hallway
2566.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow providing enough light to see by. A glass door can be seen
to the east. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2567.name: The Study
2567.description:
This is a small, well kept study. Ancient tomes are on shelves on the
walls, A huge table sits in the middle of the room, with maps weighted
down upon it. The only light source here comes from an interestingly
non-magical oil lamp. The only apparent exit leads back west to the
hallway. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

2568.name: Below The Stairs
2568.description:
This is the end of a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. A lesser guardian is here keeping
silent watch on the entrance to the levels above. Stairs lead up and the
hallway continues back south. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2569.name: Atop The Stairway
2569.description:
This isop a stairway. The halls here look quite a bit less used than
those below. Obviously access to these magic filled corridors is limited
to those of the upper echelon of mages. The walls here emit a faint blue
magical aura which provides some light. The hallway leads west from here
and the stairs go down. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2570.name: A Hallway
2570.description:
This is a long hallway stretching east and west. The walls here emit a
faint magical energy providing enough light to see by. There is a thick
looking wooden door to the north. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The
air is still and musty.

2571.name: A Small Office
2571.description:
This is a small office. It looks like a calligrapher's study, there are
quills, inkpots and parchments all about on desks and worktables. A
section to the west seems to be curtained off, but the flicker of a
candle can be seen through the curtain. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2572.name: A Hallway
2572.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2573.name: The Master Scribe's Workshop
2573.description:
This is the workshop of the tower's master scribe. Many half finished
scrolls lay on the writing table in the center of the room. A giant
candle flickering with soft blue flames provides the only light here.
The only apparent exit is the way you came in. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2574.name: A Hallway
2574.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A half-closed door
can be seen to the north. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A dark room can be seen through the half-opened door.

2575.name: A Store Room
2575.description:
This is a small dark store room. A few common items are stacked upon the
shelves here, but very little looks interesting. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2576.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2576.description:
This is a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues south and
east from here. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

2577.name: A Hallway
2577.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. An iron bound door
can be seen to the west. The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in
the corners.

2578.name: A Hallway
2578.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The sharp sound of
metal on metal can be heard to the west. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2579.name: A Store Room
2579.description:
This is a large store room. Bins of ores, minerals and other rare
materials are here along with many neatly stacked piles of precious
metals. The ring of metal on metal can be heard to the south. A large
cabinet with sigils of warding is bolted to one wall. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2580.name: A Hallway
2580.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The air is still and musty.

2581.name: A Very Hot Room
2581.description:
This is a very hot room. Against one wall is a large forge, magical
fires crackle within and heavy blue smoke pours into a vent in the
ceiling. A rune-encrusted mithril anvil is in the center of the room,
looking well used. Other tools of metallurgy hang on a rack which floats
about three meters in the air of its own force. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2582.name: The Master Enchanter's Chamber
2582.description:
The entrance opens to the Master Enchanter's chamber. Upon all the walls
here are racks of finely crafted weapons. A huge chest with a glowing
lock is set to one side. Several unfinished looking blades rest atop a
small work table. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

2583.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2583.description:
This is a bend in a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and
east. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2584.name: A Hallway
2584.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A steel door can be
seen to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

2585.name: A Hallway
2585.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2586.name: A Laboratory
2586.description:
This is a small laboratory. Many strange instruments, vials, bottles and
some scrawled notes are piled about a workbench. This room is very
untidy, looking almost abandoned, or used by a madman. The only apparent
exits are east and north. The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in
the corners.

2587.name: A Hallway
2587.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Visible is a steel
door to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

2588.name: The Mad Alchemist's Workroom
2588.description:
This is the workroom of The Mad Alchemist. Bubbling braziers, long glass
tubes and scores of oddly shaped vials and bottles are everywhere. It is
incredibly messy here, crushed glass and other trash litter the floor.
The only apparent exit is the one you entered by. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

2589.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2589.description:
This is a bend in a long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and
west. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in
the corners.

2590.name: The Pentagram Chamber
2590.description:
This is a large room with a five pointed star etched into the floor. A
crackling energy field can be seen to the south, it looks quite
dangerous. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The energy field crackles and glows, nothing seems to be beyond.

2591.name: A Hallway
2591.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A bronze door can be
seen to the east. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
air is still and musty.

2592.name: Inside The Energy Field
2592.description:
You feel a stomach twisting sensation as you enter the energy field.
Nice going! You might as well wait here until the wizard who built this
trap comes back to imprison your soul as well as your body. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2593.name: A Hallway
2593.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A bronze door can be
seen to the east. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

2594.name: An Empty Room
2594.description:
This is an empty room. It is both quiet and comfortable here, it looks
like a safe place to rest. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2595.name: The Charm Master's Chamber
2595.description:
This is the chambers of the tower's Master of Charm. Some straw and dirt
litters the floor here, it looks to have been recently used by wild
animals. Strange sounds can be heard through the bars to the north. The
air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2596.name: A Hallway
2596.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2597.name: The Animal Pens
2597.description:
This is the animal pens. Many caged animals are here looking unhappy.
Obviously they are destined to be enslaved, or used in some cruel
magical experimentation. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows
gather in the corners.

2598.name: The End Of The Hallway
2598.description:
This is the end of a long north-south hallway. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Stairs here lead up
to the next level, and the hallway continues south. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2599.name: Atop The Stairway
2599.description:
This isop the stairway to the upper levels of the high tower. The walls
emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A
hallway leads west from here, and the stairs lead down. Dust motes drift
in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

2600.name: A Hallway
2600.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A silver door can be
seen to the north. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

2601.name: A Store Room
2601.description:
This is a large store room. Raw materials are neatly bundled and piled
here and here. Many freshly cut staves rods and wands of different sizes
are here. Visible is a silver door to the west. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

2602.name: The Master Spellbinder's Chamber
2602.description:
This is the chambers of the Master Spellbinder. Unlike other work shops
of similar nature, this one is without furnishings or tools. The spell
binder obviously needs none for the working of his art. A silver door
can be seen to the west. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is
still and musty.

2603.name: The Spellbinder's Cache
2603.description:
You have discovered the cache of the Master Spellbinder. There are three
very large silver chased cabinets here, other than that, the room is
bare. A silver door can be seen to the south. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2604.name: A Hallway
2604.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The ceiling hangs
low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2605.name: A Hallway
2605.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A silver door can be
seen to the north. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs
low overhead.

2606.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2606.description:
This is a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues east and
south. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2607.name: A Hallway
2607.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2608.name: A Hallway
2608.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A rusty old door can
be seen to the west. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still
and musty.

2609.name: The Golem Master's Workshop
2609.description:
This is the golem master's workshop. A few unfinished looking humanoid
forms of different make are here, some moving, some not. The animated
forms lunge to attack you. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

2610.name: A Store Room
2610.description:
This is a small store room. Large chunks of clay, stone, wood and many
other raw materials are here. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2611.name: The Golem Chamber
2611.description:
This is the golem chamber. Golems made of every imaginable material are
here, ranging in size from a hand-span to nearly the ceiling. They all
seem to be sleeping. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather
in the corners.

2612.name: It Is Very Dark Here...
2612.description:
Absolute darkness surrounds you in this sealed chamber. The air crackles
with residual magical energy, and you sense ancient wards blocking all
light from entering this sanctum. Shadows gather in the corners. The air
is still and musty.

2613.name: A Hallway
2613.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The air is still and
musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2614.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2614.description:
This is a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and
east from here. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

2615.name: A Hallway
2615.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2616.name: A Hallway
2616.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. An emerald door can
be seen to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still
and musty.

2617.name: The Illusion Master's Chamber
2617.description:
This is the chamber of the Master of Illusions. The walls here are ever
changing in colour and texture, as if they were reforming before your
very eyes. Many splendorous treasures lie all around in heaps and piles,
or at least they seem to be treasures... Shadows gather in the corners.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2618.name: A Bedroom
2618.description:
This is the bedroom of the Master of Illusions. Strange looking items
and artifacts float here and there in the air. The ripples of strong
magic can be felt everywhere. The room seems much larger than it
looks... Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

north.description: The room stretches off to the north.

south.description: The room stretches off to the south.

west.description: The room stretches off to the west.

2619.name: A Hallway
2619.description:
This is a long hallway leading east and west. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A glass door can be
seen to the south. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

2620.name: The Meditation Chamber
2620.description:
This is a meditation chamber. It is very silent here, in fact you can
not even hear your own footsteps. You feel very peaceful. The air is
still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2621.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2621.description:
This is a bend in the long hallway. The walls emit a faint magical glow
which provides enough light to see by. The hallway continues north and
west from here. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2622.name: A Hallway
2622.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. A blackened door can
be seen to the east. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2623.name: A Dark Room
2623.description:
This is a large dark room. The air here seems quite stale, and a sense
of extreme dread comes over you. The stench of rotten flesh seems to be
wafting in from the open doorway to the north. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

2624.name: A Dark Room
2624.description:
This is a large dark room. The stench here makes you gag and retch.
There are body parts and half rotted corpses strewn about with complete
abandon. Several operating tables with still forms that resemble nothing
you have ever seen alive are here. Tortured screams can be heard from
the north. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

north.description: Gazing northwards, you are filled with deep dread.

2625.name: The Necromancer's Lair
2625.description:
This is the lair of the evil Necromancer. Undead minions of all types,
human and otherwise stand here waiting to do their master's bidding.
Some glowing arcane sigils have been etched into walls and floor, no
doubt to protect the evil master from his own ungodly creations. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

2626.name: A Hallway
2626.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. Shadows gather in
the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2627.name: A Hallway
2627.description:
This is a long hallway leading north and south. The walls emit a faint
magical glow which provides enough light to see by. The ceiling hangs
low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2628.name: The End Of The Hallway
2628.description:
This is the end of a long hallway. The walls here glow with a faint
magical energy which provides plenty of light. Stairs lead up to the
next level here and the hallway continues south. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2629.name: A Corridor
2629.description:
This is the east end of a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with
ancient runes of power stretch out before. Magical energies seem to
crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten,
almost as if the corridor itself were alive. The air is still and musty.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2630.name: A Corridor
2630.description:
This is a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of
power stretch out before. Magical energies seem to crackle with power
all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the
corridor itself were alive. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2631.name: A Bend In The Corridor
2631.description:
This is a bend in the long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with
ancient runes of power stretch out before. Magical energies seem to
crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten,
almost as if the corridor itself were alive. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

2632.name: A Corridor
2632.description:
This is a long corridor leading north and south. Obsidian walls engraved
with ancient runes of power stretch out before. Magical energies seem to
crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten,
almost as if the corridor itself were alive. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

2633.name: An Intersection
2633.description:
This is an intersection in the corridor. The obsidian walled halls lead
off in every direction from here, pulsing with the power of their
ancient runes. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

2634.name: A Corridor
2634.description:
This is the end of a long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved with ancient
runes of power stretch out before. A darkened door is to the east.
Tendrils of mist cling to the floor here, they seem to be seeping from
under the door. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

2635.name: The Scrying Chamber
2635.description:
This is the scrying chamber of the high tower of sorcerery. It is here
that arcane rituals are performed to enable those of the art to look in
upon denizens throughout the world and spy out their darkest secrets. A
huge black cauldron is in the center of the room, bubbling and gurgling,
it pours forth a constant stream of smokey fog into the air about you.
Here and there on stands of different sizes are crystal balls and oddly
shaped mirrors. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

2636.name: A Corridor
2636.description:
You have reached an end in the long corridor. Obsidian walls engraved
with ancient runes of power stretch out before. The sound of snoring
can barely be heard through the door to the west. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2637.name: The Entrance To The Library
2637.description:
This is the entrance to the great library of magic. A giant desk is
here, covered with books parchments and scrolls. Long shelves loaded
with row upon row of books stretch out in every direction as far as the
eye can see. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

north.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2638.name: In The Library
2638.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2639.name: In The Library
2639.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows
gather in the corners.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2640.name: In The Library
2640.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows
gather in the corners.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2641.name: In The Library
2641.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is
still and musty.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2642.name: In The Library
2642.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2643.name: In The Library
2643.description:
This is the great library of magic. A strong musty smell permeates the
entire area. Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of
books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour. The
elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained
eyes. It is very quiet here. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: You see a small gap between some shelves.

2644.name: Between The Shelves
2644.description:
This is the great library of magic. The shelves seem uncomfortably close
here, you can barely maneuver between them. The musty smell is still
strong, and the elusive books still hover just out of reach. A faint
flicker of light can barely be made out to the north. Dust motes drift
in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

2645.name: The Reading Room
2645.description:
This is a small room completely devoid of furnishings. The only thing
here is an enormous tome, lying face open on the floor. The great book
looks both heavy and ancient. Its jewel encrusted bindings are well worn
as the bark of a tree. Spidery writings seem to crawls across the pages,
totally incomprehensible to your mortal eye. Something seems to be
wedged between the pages. The air is still and musty. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2646.name: A Corridor
2646.description:
This is a long corridor leading north and south. Obsidian walls engraved
with ancient runes of power stretch out before. Magical energies seem to
crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten,
almost as if the corridor itself were alive. Shadows gather in the
corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2647.name: The End Of The Corridor
2647.description:
This is the end of a long corridor. The obsidian walls come to an abrupt
halt at the edge of a golden archway here. The hum of power is so strong
it nearly numbs your body. The archway lies before, glowing and pulsing
with energy. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is
still and musty.

2648.name: The Arched Entrance
2648.description:
You feel a slight tingle as you pass through the archway, as if the
living magical energies here had infused your body, found it wanting and
left. The intense glow from the arch above is almost blinding.
Through the light you can barely make out a stairway leading up. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

2649.name: The Landing
2649.description:
The area is a small landing in the middle of a long stairway leading up.
Your senses seem dulled here, no sound or smell can be detected at all,
and the only thing Visible is in any direction is endless stairway. The
air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

2650.name: An Intersection
2650.description:
This is an intersection of several hallways. You feel as if strange
mystical forces are pushing and pulling at each other from all around
you. The sensation of being trapped, in the middle is almost tangible in
the air here. A grey tiled hallway leads south, black tiled east, white
tiled west, and a multi-coloured hallway swirling with patterns that
remain just barely unrecognizable is to the north. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2651.name: A Grey Tiled Hallway
2651.description:
This is a grey tiled hallway leading north and south. Dim balls of
energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way.
A feeling of peace and balance comes over you. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

2652.name: A Grey Tiled Hallway
2652.description:
This is a grey tiled hallway leading north and south. Dim balls of
energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way.
A feeling of peace and balance comes over you. Large, grey metal double
doors can be seen to the south. The air is still and musty. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

2653.name: The Antechamber
2653.description:
This is the antechamber of the Master Magician of the Grey Light. A
feeling of strong magic floats in the air about you, almost as if you
could taste the power held within these walls. Once your eyes adjust to
the semi-light, you can make out a larger room to the south. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2654.name: The Main Chamber
2654.description:
A feeling of tranquility comes over you as you enter the main chamber of
Neutrality. Some artifacts are hung on the walls here, or set on stands.
The room in general looks both comfortable and official. Probably where
the Master of Neutrality holds audience. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2655.name: The Study
2655.description:
This is a large study. Shelves filled with many books or arcane
knowledge are on every wall. A large oaken desk is in the center, with
many parchments and scrolls on it. The most notable thing in the room is
a small set of scales, which floats about eye level. In perfect balance,
the scales are no doubt a sign of the Master's neutrality. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

2656.name: A Closet
2656.description:
This is a small closet. It is filled with many cloaks, and some other
apparel. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

2657.name: A Bedroom
2657.description:
This is the bedroom of the Master Magician of Neutrality. Curtained
windows can be seen on the south wall. A large comfortable looking bed
takes up most of the room. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2658.name: A Dark Hallway
2658.description:
This is a long dark hallway leading east and west. Not much can be seen
in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the
further you go. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2659.name: A Dark Hallway
2659.description:
This is a long dark hallway leading east and west. Not much can be seen
in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the
further you go. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the
corners.

2660.name: The End Of The Hallway
2660.description:
This is the end of a long dark hallway. The darkness here is almost
tangible in its thickness. A deep sense of fear and loathing comes over
you. A pair of obsidian doors can be seen to the east. The air is still
and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2661.name: The Chamber Of Darkness
2661.description:
This is a vast chamber. The walls fade into darkness, leaving you with a
very vague idea of the actual size of the room. Swirling here and there
in the dark, are patches of pure black which seem to suck in your light
and leave it that much darker here. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2662.name: It Is Very Dark Here...
2662.description:
Pitch black engulfs you completely. The tower's magical darkness is so
profound that even enchanted lights fail to pierce it. You feel the
weight of powerful spells maintaining this void. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

2663.name: A Torture Chamber
2663.description:
This is an ill lit chamber. Instruments of torture hang from a rack on
the wall, they seem to quiver with anticipation of a victim as if they
had a mind of their own. An operating table is here, though it is bare.
An extreme feeling of evil permeates the entire area. The air is still
and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2664.name: The Inner Chamber
2664.description:
This is a small dark chamber. Upon the walls are glowing sigils of dark
power, scrawled and traced in an evil language no longer known to most
of this plane of existence. There is an obsidian altar here which seems
to glow, but does not shed any light, in fact it seems to be taking
light in. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

2665.name: A Bright Hallway
2665.description:
This is a long well lit hallway leading east and west. The walls here
are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the
floor. A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy
to tread upon these sacred floors. Shadows gather in the corners. The
air is still and musty.

2666.name: A Bright Hallway
2666.description:
This is a long well lit hallway leading east and west. The walls here
are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the
floor. A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy
to tread upon these sacred floors. A huge set of double doors in finely
worked ivory can be seen to the west. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The air is still and musty.

2667.name: An Antechamber
2667.description:
This is a small antechamber. It is well lit here, though the source of
light cannot be seen. It is almost as if the room itself exudes a warm
glow of goodness. A larger chamber can be seen to the west, but you do
not feel worthy to pass into it. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

2669.name: The Chamber Of The White Light
2669.description:
This is a vast chamber, its walls floor and ceiling are of an unknown
metallic material, the brightest white, almost blindingly stark. A
flickering flame is in the center of the room, seeming to feed off of
darkness and cleansing the room of any evil. You feel a slight tug at
your being as the flame flickers towards you. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

2670.name: The Meditation Chamber
2670.description:
This is a small meditation chamber. White silk cushions are everywhere,
looking very comfortable. You get an easy peaceful feeling of relaxation
here, almost making you want to lie down and fall asleep. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2671.name: A Study
2671.description:
This is a spacious study. It is extremely tidy here, to an almost
antiseptic nature. One would wonder how anyone could study without a
mess all around them, the master of this chamber obviously can. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

2672.name: A Closet
2672.description:
This is a small closet. Cloaks and vests hang from hooks in the wall,
and a few old boots are all that can be seen here. Rather featureless
all in all. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

2673.name: A Wide Hallway
2673.description:
This is a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns,
in constant motion. A huge, grey metal door blocks the way north, it
looks quite sturdy. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and
musty.

2674.name: A Wide Hallway
2674.description:
This is a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns,
in constant motion. A huge, black obsidian door blocks the way north, it
looks quite sturdy. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still
and musty.

2675.name: A Wide Hallway
2675.description:
This is a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people
standing abreast. The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns,
in constant motion. A huge, white ivory door blocks the way north, it
looks quite sturdy. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still
and musty.

2676.name: The Entranceway
2676.description:
This is the entrance to the audience chamber of the Grand Master of
Magic. Beautiful tapestries displaying the ancient masters of lore are
on the walls, and the floor is covered with a plush multicoloured
carpet, which seems to rustle and move at the touch of your boots. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

2677.name: The Audience Chamber
2677.description:
This is a large chamber. Small bolts of energy leap from wall to wall,
crackling with power. The floor is a swirl of indeterminable colours and
patterns ever changing. Bright bursts of colour seem to explode into the
air and fade again at random times. All this splendor plays about and
draws attention to a large throne in the center of the room, it seems to
be cut from a single enormous emerald. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
Shadows gather in the corners.

2678.name: A Dressing Room
2678.description:
This is a plush dressing room. Fine garments of many styles and some
outlandish colours hang from a rack suspended in mid air at eye level.
The only other interesting feature in the room is a large silver mirror
on a finely crafted gold stand. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

2679.name: The Library
2679.description:
This is a small cosy looking library. A few well made books sit atop
shelves which span every wall. A large oaken writing table is in the
center of the room with odd papers and parchments on it. The
illumination here, to your surprise is a quite un-magical oil lamp.
Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2680.name: The Altar
2680.description:
This is a small chapel designed around a beautifully crafted golden
altar. Many icons to lesser deities line the room, but it is obvious by
one glance at the symbols on the altar, that this room was designed for
the worship of Mystra, the goddess of magic. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

2681.name: The Treasury
2681.description:
This is a small chamber, the stale air here is testament to the fact
that it has gone undisturbed for many years. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

2682.name: A Passage
2682.description:
This is a small dark passage, which would be unremarkable if not for the
fact that it ends in a blinding blue light to the west. On hooks set
into the wall here there hang several travel worthy cloaks, and a small
leather backpack. It looks as if someone has prepared this room to be
used in the event speedy of a evacuation. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

2683.name: In The Light
2683.description:
You seem to be floating in a magical energy field, though you cannot see
the source of the energy, you can feel its power pushing at you from all
sides, completely negating the effects of gravity. An imperfection in
the uniform blue can be seen overhead, it might be an exit. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

2500.name: shadow
2500.long_desc: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
2500.description: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...

2501.name: adventurer
2501.long_desc: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
2501.description: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

2502.name: edgar
2502.long_desc: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.
2502.description:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

2503.name: diamond
2503.long_desc: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.

2504.name: mage
2504.long_desc: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
2504.description:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.

2505.name: strick
2505.long_desc: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
2505.description: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

2506.name: tatorious
2506.long_desc: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.

2507.name: ezmerelda
2507.long_desc: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
2507.description:
She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen,
but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of
mages.

2508.name: assistant
2508.long_desc: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
2508.description: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.

2509.name: prisoner
2509.long_desc: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
2509.description:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they
must have been fine garments.  A metal muzzle has been fitted over the
poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence
his spell casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.

2510.name: jailor
2510.long_desc: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.

2511.name: broom
2511.long_desc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
2511.description: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

2512.name: lesser
2512.long_desc: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
2512.description: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

2513.name: guardian
2513.long_desc: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.

2514.name: mage
2514.long_desc: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.

2515.name: apprentice
2515.long_desc: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
2515.description: She looks quite intent on her studies.

2516.name: apprentice
2516.long_desc: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
2516.description: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

2517.name: apprentice
2517.long_desc: A young apprentice is sleeping here.

2518.name: apprentice
2518.long_desc: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
2518.description: He looks like a mischievous youth.

2519.name: kitten
2519.long_desc: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
2519.description:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor
burns mark its mottled coat.

2520.name: student
2520.long_desc: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.

2521.name: instructor
2521.long_desc: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
2521.description: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

2522.name: student
2522.long_desc: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
2522.description: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

2523.name: teacher
2523.long_desc: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
2523.description: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.

2524.name: student
2524.long_desc: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
2524.description: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

2525.name: wizard
2525.long_desc: An old wizard is here making a speech here.
2525.description:
This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest
living man.  Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic
available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws...
this man might be as young as you.

2526.name: mage
2526.long_desc: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
2526.description:
This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend
himself.

2527.name: mistress
2527.long_desc: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
2527.description:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.

2528.name: mage
2528.long_desc: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
2528.description:
The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult
spells, and inattentive students.

2529.name: wizard
2529.long_desc: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
2529.description:
Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right
now, better not wake him up.

2530.name: scribe
2530.long_desc: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
2530.description:
He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right
now.

2531.name: scribe
2531.long_desc: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
2531.description:
She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.

2532.name: master
2532.long_desc: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset
2532.description:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

2533.name: assistant
2533.long_desc: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
2533.description:
You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents,
since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.

2534.name: master
2534.long_desc: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
2534.description:
The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could
either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than
it already is.

2535.name: sword
2535.long_desc: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.

2536.name: alchemist
2536.long_desc: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
2536.description:
He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart
around wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

2537.name: master
2537.long_desc: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
2537.description:
The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control
over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other
side of it.

2538.name: master
2538.long_desc: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
2538.description: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

2539.name: golem
2539.long_desc: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.

2540.name: master
2540.long_desc: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
2540.description: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.

2541.name: master
2541.long_desc: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.
2541.description:
The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to
the point of fussing over it.

2542.name: golem
2542.long_desc: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
2542.description: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

2543.name: golem
2543.long_desc: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.

2544.name: golem
2544.long_desc: A flesh golem stands guard here
2544.description:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't
even resemble anything human.

2545.name: golem
2545.long_desc: A cloth golem wanders around here.
2545.description: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

2546.name: golem
2546.long_desc: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
2546.description:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

2547.name: golem
2547.long_desc: A clay golem stands guard here.
2547.description: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.

2548.name: master
2548.long_desc: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
2548.description:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon
was now stands a small harmless looking old man.

2549.name: necromancer
2549.long_desc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
2549.description:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

2550.name: skeleton
2550.long_desc: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
2550.description: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

2551.name: undead
2551.long_desc: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
2551.description:
This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an
enormous zombie.

2552.name: witch
2552.long_desc: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
2552.description:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about
where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes
your skin crawl with revulsion.

2553.name: librarian
2553.long_desc: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
2553.description: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

2554.name: apprentice
2554.long_desc: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
2554.description:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.

2555.name: cat
2555.long_desc: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
2555.description:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large
claws.

2556.name: master
2556.long_desc: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.

2557.name: apprentice
2557.long_desc: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
2557.description:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once
she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to
be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

2558.name: cat
2558.long_desc: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
2558.description:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.

2559.name: master
2559.short_desc: the Master of the Black Robes
2559.long_desc: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.

2560.name: apprentice
2560.long_desc: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
2560.description:
He looks like a fanatic.
The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'

2561.name: cat
2561.long_desc: A white cat is here preening its fur.
2561.description: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

2562.name: master
2562.long_desc: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
2562.description: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

2563.name: cat
2563.long_desc: A large calico cat is lounging about here.
2563.description:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

2564.name: guildmaster
2564.long_desc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
2564.description:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.

2500.name: key
2500.room_desc: A glinting key of diamond has been left here.

2504.name: slice
2504.room_desc: A slice of traveller's bread is here looking very tasty.

2505.name: chunk
2505.room_desc: A large chunk of meat is here.

2507.name: broom
2507.room_desc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.

2509.name: bar
2509.room_desc: A bar of silver has been left here.

2510.name: bar
2510.room_desc: A bar of gold has been left here.

2511.name: bar
2511.room_desc: A bar of mithril has been left here.

2512.name: bar
2512.room_desc: A bar of adamantite has been left here.

2513.name: hammer
2513.room_desc: a mithril hammer has been left here

2515.name: key
2515.room_desc: A small key has been left here.

2516.name: long
2516.room_desc: A long sword has been left here.

2517.name: dagger
2517.room_desc: A finely crafted dagger made of silver is on the ground here.

2518.name: scimitar
2518.room_desc: A curved scimitar is here in a jewel-covered sheath.

2519.name: staff
2519.room_desc: A wooden staff is against the wall here.

2520.name: cabinet
2520.room_desc: A large cabinet with a silver finish is here.

2521.name: cabinet
2521.room_desc: A large cabinet with a silver finish is here.

2523.name: key
2523.room_desc: A silvery key has been left here.

2524.name: key
2524.room_desc: A silvery key has been left here.

2525.name: staff
2525.room_desc: a red and white staff is leaning against the wall here

2526.name: staff
2526.room_desc: A burnt staff is leaning against the wall here.

2527.name: rod
2527.room_desc: A black rod has been left here.

2530.name: cauldron
2530.room_desc: A large black cauldron is here bubbling.

2531.name: wings
2531.short_desc: a small pair of bat wings
2531.room_desc: A small pair of bat wings is here.

2532.name: eyeball
2532.room_desc: An eyeball has been left here

2533.name: book
2533.room_desc: An enormous book is lying open here

2534.name: spectacles
2534.room_desc: A pair of wire-rimmed spectacles has been left here.

2536.name: medallion
2536.room_desc: A heart shaped medallion is here.

2538.name: key
2538.room_desc: An intricately carved key has been left here.

2539.name: a
2539.short_desc: a pile of coins is here
2539.room_desc: A pile of coins is here.

2540.name: cloak
2540.room_desc: A travel worn cloak has carelessly been left here.

2541.name: chameleon
2541.room_desc: Some multicolored cloth is on the ground here

2542.name: boots
2542.room_desc: A pair of old boots is here, they look very comfortable.

2543.name: ring
2543.room_desc: A small seashell has been left here.

2546.name: waybread
2546.room_desc: A loaf of waybread has been left here.

2547.name: cleaver
2547.room_desc: A meat cleaver is sticking in the wall here.

2548.name: shackles
2548.room_desc: Some chain shackles have been discarded here

2549.name: dagger
2549.room_desc: A long dagger that seems to be made of silver is here.

2551.name: scroll
2551.room_desc: A bound scroll is here blowing in the breeze.

2552.name: tube
2552.room_desc: A long cylindrical tube is rolling around here.

2553.name: scroll
2553.room_desc: An old scroll has been left here.

2554.name: scroll
2554.short_desc: a scroll written on blue paper
2554.room_desc: A blue scroll has been left here.

2555.name: pouch
2555.room_desc: A leather pouch is on the ground here.

2556.name: spoon
2556.room_desc: A silver stirring spoon has been left here.

2558.name: potion
2558.room_desc: A bright red potion is here.

2560.name: potion
2560.room_desc: An effervescent potion is bubbling away here

2561.name: white
2561.room_desc: A milky white potion is here.

2562.name: staff
2562.room_desc: A black staff is leaning against the wall here.

2563.name: flute
2563.room_desc: A golden flute has been left here.

2564.name: figurine
2564.room_desc: A small figurine in the shape of a humanoid is standing here.

2569.name: dust
2569.room_desc: Some sparkling dust is in a pile here.

2572.name: club
2572.room_desc: A huge spiked club has been left here.

2573.name: robe
2573.room_desc: A pile of grey cloth has been left here.

2574.name: bracelet
2574.room_desc: A glinting hoop of silvery metal is here.

2575.name: cloak
2575.room_desc: A pile of grey cloth has been left here.

2576.name: staff
2576.room_desc: A grey piece of wood shod in iron has been left here.

2577.name: minor
2577.room_desc: A small clear cube is sitting here.

2578.name: robe
2578.room_desc: A pile of black cloth is on the ground here.

2579.name: bracelet
2579.room_desc: A hoop of black onyx is here.

2580.name: cloak
2580.room_desc: A pile of black cloth is on the ground here.

2581.name: shard
2581.room_desc: A piece of black glass is here.

2582.name: robe
2582.room_desc: A pile of white cloth is on the ground here.

2583.name: bracelet
2583.room_desc: A hoop of silvery metal is here.

2584.name: cloak
2584.room_desc: A pile of white cloth is on the ground here.

2585.name: ivory
2585.room_desc: An ivory hilted dagger has been left here

2586.name: collar
2586.room_desc: A small spiked collar is here.

2587.name: cloak
2587.short_desc: a shimmering cloak of many colors
2587.room_desc: A multi-colored pile of cloth is here.

2588.name: emerald
2588.room_desc: A small ring with a green gemstone is here.

2589.name: bracelet
2589.room_desc: A beautifully crafted hoop of emerald is here.

2590.name: ward
2590.room_desc: A large clear crystal cube is here.

2591.name: ebony
2591.room_desc: A wavy bladed knife made of ebony is here.

2592.name: green
2592.short_desc: a tight fitting green dragon scale shirt
2592.room_desc: Some green dragon scales which have been sewn together are here.

2593.name: key
2593.room_desc: A key made of a strange grey metal has been left here.

2594.name: key
2594.room_desc: A key made of black obsidian has been left here.

2595.name: key
2595.room_desc: A key made of white ivory has been left here.
